Property home

Property has four fundamental rights:

  1. Right to use
  2. Right to exclude
  3. Right to include/convey
  4. Right to alter/destroy

Jacque v. Steenberg

Property Rights can be anologized to a bundle of sticks.

State v. Shack

Theories and bases of Property:

  • First-in-time
  • Labor
  • Incentive/Instrumentalism
  • Market Efficiency
  • Power
